appendix.title: &wecabbrev; configuration example
appendix.synopsis:
server: "wec.mydomain" port: 5986 keyfile: "/opt/syslog-ng/etc/server.key" certfile: "/opt/syslog-ng/etc/server.crt" cadir: "/opt/syslog-ng/etc/cadir"
log: level: "info" file: "/opt/syslog-ng/var/wec.log"
eventdestination: unixdatagram: "/opt/syslog-ng/var/run/wec.sock"
subscriptions: - name: "ExampleDefaultSubscription" computers: - "windowsdc.mydomain.com" - "*.trusteddomain.com"
contentformat: "RenderedText" heartbeats: 900.000 connectionretry: 60.0 batchtimeoutlimit: 900.000 queries: | <QueryList> <Query Id="0"> <Select Path="Application">*</Select> <Select Path="Security">*</Select> <Select Path="System">*</Select> </Query> </QueryList>
